text: Koko (9 April 2005 - 18 December 2012) was an Australian Kelpie actor and fundraiser. He is best known for his role as the title character of the movie Red Dog (2011). His owner was Nelson Woss, a producer of Red Dog. He was born in Dunolly, Victoria. Koko died from heart failure caused by heart disease on 18 December 2012 in Perth, Western Australia. He was 7. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2005 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Actors from Victoria (Australia) Category:Australian movie actors Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Individual dogs
title: Koko (dog)
